website_summaries.verdict: The midsize Samsung Galaxy S10 has all the attractive features of the S10+ for less money, but we still think the smaller S10e is a better buy.
pros: Headphone jack and microSD card slot
cons: In-display fingerprint sensor has no physical guide

customer_reviews.title: Used phone on delivery with scuff marks
customer_reviews.text: I will leave this review until I get a genuine reason as to why the phone which had an eu seal had scuff marks around the aluminium. I literally got the phone 30 minutes ago which i appreciate was fast but the phone itself is being sold as new and a uk version (uk viable). Just to clarify all 4 corners of the phone are scratched with no plastic film on the front of the phone but on the back. The screen itself appears intact but i obviously do not feel comfortable with this phone now. I was really happy about getting this phone as well. 1 star until resolved
customer_reviews.author: Michael E-B

customer_reviews.title: Love it..
customer_reviews.text: I received this phone quickly and safely. Didn't really know what to expect at first as this was my first phone that I bought from Amazon. Everything worked perfectly and I have no problems. The phone itself is beautiful and I love using it for daily use. I recently bought an S3 Gear to go with it and it makes for a perfect pair. Samsung has really outdid themselves with this phone.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: awful battery
customer_reviews.text: Solid phone..great camera .. however.. awful battery.. drains to fast
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: What are you waiting for ? :)
customer_reviews.text: Love it. If you are samsung and android enthusiast do not hesitate any longer. I love the idea of having computer in my pocket, brilliant device.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lies
customer_reviews.text: Dont buy this phone for this dealer. It was a United Arab Emirates phone and not a UK origin phone.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Great phone.
customer_reviews.text: Great phone. Its so sleek. My favourite Samsung phone yet.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Welch

customer_reviews.title: The best phone money can buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best phone (and camera!) I've ever owned but it comes with a hefty price tag!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander S.

customer_reviews.title: Out of battery
customer_reviews.text: From the first day of it release....i loved to use this phone....but the worst part was...the battery wnt last long.....not even for 12 hour.
customer_reviews.author: Dipa limbu

customer_reviews.title: Not UK Version as described!!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't opened the box to know about battery life etc because I specifically ordered the UK Version and the box quite clearly states it is the European version. The package also contained a UK Plug loose within the bag which I was not expecting, again because I had ordered a UK Version!
customer_reviews.author: Gemma

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a software tester and has tested most of the phones on the market. When I asked her which phone to go for she said an Apple iphone or a Samsung S10 or above, both are very good and robust. I could not afford an Apple so bougth an S10. I really like this phone, does all the thing you'd expect. The finger print reader is vert good. Good camera and screen. Battery life is not to bad. I cannot compare this an iPhone, but I am very satisfied with my S10
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Anthony Carley

customer_reviews.title: It arrived early then accepted
customer_reviews.text: I like the face designed , the camera is great , best looking phone in the market
customer_reviews.author: Seedy

customer_reviews.title: The Wifi
customer_reviews.text: So I do like this phone, the biometric work well and does the face recognition. The display is really nice as well as the camera. My bug bear on this device is the Wifi, I do have the phone in a Samsung LED case which I am now thinking could be a problem... For me it either is really slow (extremely slow) or shows my wifi as connected but no Internet... I then have to disconnect my Wifi and reconnect it again... there were a number of Software Updates that tried to fix this problem, the last update I got didn't mention Wifi so I guess Samsung think it's fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Wembley

customer_reviews.title: Happy with Galaxy S10
customer_reviews.text: The Galaxy S10 arrived in one day, very quick. Everything seems to be perfectly fine. Im very happy with the product and the value of money. One thing, if you decide to buy and you have an obtion choose EU version, will be the same as UK version, the difference is the plug but as long you have a Uk plug and you can conect it to the wire its perfectly fine and you can get the android much cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Premium quality phone
customer_reviews.text: The phone feels really good in the hand and the screen is gorgeous. I bought this phone through Amazon through a 3rd party fulfiller. Phone is all good, only thing is that it was clear I was given an Italian version of the phone even though I ordered UK. This is not a problem because they are both under the Samsung Europe phone and it was easy to switch language right at the start. It did come with a European charger though which was a bit annoying. Other than that, fingerprint reader is not as bad as i was expecting..happy with the phone!
customer_reviews.author: sg5511

customer_reviews.title: Great water resistant phone
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I bought this phone is its IP 68 rating. Making it water resistant to 1m deep for 30 minutes according to the manufacturer. I learnt the hard way the importance of the IP rating. Both my partner's and my former phones dropped in sea water. After retrieving them, mine looked like a rust piece of iron and never recovered. My partner's galaxy s10+ worked straight away without any issue. The galaxy s10 is a proven very resistant phone with great screen definition. Only thing that lets it down is the battery life.
customer_reviews.author: N A

customer_reviews.title: Exit button too close to space bar.
customer_reviews.text: Good battery life and camera. Major downside is that the exit button at the bottom of the screen is too close to the space bar on the keyboard, making it very easy to exit inadvertently whilst typing, which is at best inconvenient and at worst means losing all your work! Find that the fingerprint sensor rarely works if I'm gardening and have traces of earth on my finger, which usually means entering the PIN if I need to access the phone at such times. Value for money is questionable, choice of purchase mainly down to familiarity with Samsung phones in the past and reluctance at my age to get my head round a different brand!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Sansom

customer_reviews.title: Good, but the battery
customer_reviews.text: Product is good. It's fast and works well with android 10. Battery life doesn't last as long as I expected for a 3300-3400mAh phone. Drains quickly with use, even after using medium power saving and disabling apps that run in the background. Even did a reset but no difference. After reaching out to the S10 subreddit, it seems to be affecting some Exynos models. It's a shame that the battery can only handle 1-2h screen on time, but oh well. Overall, I like it, but it really needs a software fix for the battery.
customer_reviews.author: Tobey Foxcroft

customer_reviews.title: Worth upgrading too
customer_reviews.text: If your a Samsung user and love android then expect the same plus loads more. Its water proof for 1metre and 30min max in clean unsalted water. Great for taking action snaps in swimming pools. The loads of extra features to use that I'm still discovering. Like the self mode where you can just wave your hand in front and it does a count down.
customer_reviews.author: daoiz gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone Good seller.
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit sceptical initially becasue when I opened the package it implied this was a European model instead of UK. However the seller was quick to respond and reassured me so I opened it. The phone works as expected and I am very happy with my purchase. I haven't used the face or finger print recognition yet so I am unable to comment on these features. I would so that battery life seems to be a bit shorter that I expected but lasts for most of the day.
customer_reviews.author: jen82

customer_reviews.title: A real quality phone
customer_reviews.text: Having upgraded from the Galaxy S8 this S10 is much improved. Much faster processor. Battery is infinitely superior and lasts up to 3 days instead of having to charge the S8 every day. Only downside is the finger print doesn't work well over a screen protector. Much improved camera Has WI Calling built in which works very well in low signal areas Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Mr. A. C. Thomson

customer_reviews.title: Stated that it was UK Version but was actually  European
customer_reviews.text: It was stated that it was a UK version in the product title. But I ended up receiving a European Model. Be sure to contact Amazon or any third party sellers to confirm these type of details even though it may say so in the title or description. However I can say that the phone is exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weak battery
customer_reviews.text: Everything is sort of ok. The camera is really good. Very close shots possible and slow motion is just amazing. The biggest minus is this phones battery. I had to charge it twice a day since I am a heavy user. Also the fingerprint is a struggle. It simply takes time to unlock the phone. Too long. Imprecise, not reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top class phone ....but.........
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, fast processor, great screen, love the camera. Absolute great phone. Though if you want bigger screen size and longer battery life go with the S10 + or "Xiaomi Redmi Note 9 Smartphone " . The battery sucks rocks in the S10 and you will need to charge every night. So beware on that. Do not underestimae the Xiaomi Redmi Note 9 Smartphone
customer_reviews.author: irishlad

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Phone
customer_reviews.text: Great little phone that does everything well. Quick charging charger which is required as the battery lasts just over the day at my usage. Reasonable cameras which can be easy to use when adjusted as you like. You need to watch the relevant U-tube film to set the phone up properly then your flying.
customer_reviews.author: William P.

customer_reviews.title: British unlocked dual SIM S10 Mobile
customer_reviews.text: New product, UK power plug. Dual SIM. Perfect condition. Arrived on date promised. Seller was great! However, quality of the pictures suck compared to my Samsung Galaxy S7 Edge. Extremely disappointed in Samsung. Fancy new features result in out of focus pictures or pictures that look okay but are grainy when zoomed in. S7 Edge camera retained zoomed-in crispness every time. Wouldn't have purchased the S10 model had I known.
customer_reviews.author: JustcruzinthruUK

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: Just got the phone as it was on sale for a good price. People in the reviews were talking about the device coming with scratches I think the purchased the reconditioned version. Need to find a way to get the Airbuds using a Samsung app or something.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for a money. Works fast, battery holds long, only issue that fingerprint takes few attempts to unlock, but it can be plastic screen protection. Not a big deal, use swipe security to unlock. Phone speakers are lovely too, great for playing silent music above your head on the beach
customer_reviews.author: Sigitas

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the best phone. Superb display, magnificent Dolby Atmos sound. Easy to use, great pictures and very stilish. Great video quality. The only downside compared to iphone is that night pictures are of not that good quality. But hey, if you are like me, i ve done like 5 pics in a year night mode, so not a problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lubomir Neshev

customer_reviews.title: Super!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase! Was very concerned about the wear and tear of this product for the price I paid and I’m glad to see product looks immaculate! Worth every penny! Also super fast delivery. A+++
customer_reviews.author: Awesome dude

customer_reviews.title: Received a EU version not UK
customer_reviews.text: I have received a EU version phone and not a UK despite ordering a UK version also the phone is heating too much,I am afraid it may be a defective piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I really love this phone, its the best phone I've ever had. The design is so sleek and it works perfectly. The camera quality is incredible. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good choice
customer_reviews.text: Love my new phone. Fingerprint reader still works with plastic screen cover. Battery lasts all day, for browsing and streaming music. So fast compared to my S6.
customer_reviews.author: Miss C

customer_reviews.title: Excellent phone, brand new.
customer_reviews.text: After my iPhone broke and apple was less than helpful I felt it was time for a change. Takes some adjustment getting used to Android but the sheer amount of extra features and functionality is a real treat to learn about! I was in the market for new top of the line smartphone and the S10 comes packed with better features and higher quality specs than apple. Personally for me it's been an eye opener and I'm happy with the device and the move.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew High

customer_reviews.title: Great service
customer_reviews.text: Bought s10 and was locked I didnt see. The company sterling cash converters were amazing sorted the problem no problem at all thank you sterling rgds louis
customer_reviews.author: L. Frusciante

customer_reviews.title: Tough case but fingerprint reader doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The fingerprint reader doesn't want to work through the cover which is a bit frustrating. But as I have a history of damaging the screens the ruggedness is more important
customer_reviews.author: Bill Tate

customer_reviews.title: Don't always believe what an advert says
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a UK edition.paid more for it then found out it wasn't.got one for wife in White which was UK edition for £10 less.when you put it in a case you can't tell what colour it is.otherwise a good phone takes excellent pictures.quick when browsing internet and can make calls
customer_reviews.author: Brian S.

customer_reviews.title: Great improvement from S7
customer_reviews.text: Great phone and for me a huge step up from my S7. One thing to note though is that for the picture settings does not have resolution and size separate. Annoying if you're used to that. ALSO, the selfie function for WhatsApp is really big. Makes it harder to have more than one person in a video call.
customer_reviews.author: Folake Matt

customer_reviews.title: Not happy!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working properly the day after I gave it a 5 star review. Unhelpful chatbot telling me to do a factory reset.
customer_reviews.author: Trm01

customer_reviews.title: Solid phone
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice phone but the bixby button is so annoying since its next to the volume.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good phone battery poor
customer_reviews.text: Phone is for personal use and works well but battery life is poor given my light usage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: new phone
customer_reviews.text: great phone exelent condition would buy again and good price £339.00
customer_reviews.author: colin bower

customer_reviews.title: Lovely phone
customer_reviews.text: Lovely phone but only had it 1 week. Fingers crossed it will be as reliable as my previous s8 phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor standerd miss leading and bad replacemt
customer_reviews.text: Shocking expected more from Samsung s10 at this price which came with out the Samsung charger and lead very poor replacement that doesn't charge this van and still waitin on a reply from a wk ago
customer_reviews.author: kevin g.

customer_reviews.title: EU Phone supplied With Separate UK Plug= UK Version
customer_reviews.text: Phone works fine but feels like I have been misled, Paid for a Saturday delivery, But phone was not posted until Saturday, Asked for a refund for postage, still waiting for a response. Now fulfilled by Amazon, Just My Luck
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Samsung s10
customer_reviews.text: Happy with my purchase, nice upgrade from my previous Samsung galaxy phone
customer_reviews.author: J J

customer_reviews.title: Useless. Does not work as a phone
customer_reviews.text: It does not recognise my SIM. The phone is probably locked, although it is said to be supplied unlocked. I have tried to contact seller, without success. Very poor.
customer_reviews.author: A D JOHNSTON

customer_reviews.title: Deep dot in my screen
customer_reviews.text: There is a very tiny dent on my screen and its bothering me alot. The phone came sealed and everything but when I looked at the screen in the light im noticing tiny deep dots in the screen.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria A.

customer_reviews.title: Genuine phone, big saving
customer_reviews.text: This product is a genuine samsung, sealed, unlocked. Rather than paying a phone shop 780£, get yourself a big discount over here for same service. I even got a europe charger and an uk one.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Vasilache

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: UK model but manufactures in Europe and adjusted for UK specs. Works fine with no major issues so far. Careful if you get a screen protector as finger print scanner might not work.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Worth it if you can afford it.
customer_reviews.text: lasts for ages really good screen quality and overall great phone. 👍
customer_reviews.author: petercraig

customer_reviews.title: Stopped charging after 3mnths
customer_reviews.text: This phone will no longer charge, we had it for 3mnths, I have emailed the company but have yet to receive a response
customer_reviews.author: Lisa yung

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: Though arrived 5 days late it was worth the wait, had a small prob with set up,could be that we live in Spain,my son was well pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone, have had no issues with it so far, would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: So far no problem
customer_reviews.text: I have no problem with the GALAXY S10 apart from the battery could be used up very quickly if you are not careful,
customer_reviews.author: ve

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Is a good cellphone but was not the version i expected, is a FR version not a UK one so run out of battery very fast and is a dual sim cheap version of the cellphone
customer_reviews.author: Márcio Gonçalves

customer_reviews.title: Nice phone
customer_reviews.text: Very good phone. Was supposed to be delivered within a few days but arrived next day and very well packed. Fantastic! Love the colour too.
customer_reviews.author: Q.B.

customer_reviews.title: High quality phone
customer_reviews.text: top quality product and worth the investment if your looking for a high-end phone. Picture quality and playback is superb. Great camera and large storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Over the moon!
customer_reviews.text: Such an incredible phone! The display and camera are just unparamounted to any other phone I have had....Im totally overjoyed with this phone!!! Another great product from samsung
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: Everything you could ever want and need ftom a phone. Camera and battery amazing! Finger print can be very tempremental at times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone and great seller
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful phone. Very good battery life. Currently I'm getting a day and a half from full charge. But I'm not a heavy user. Seller is awesome posted out phone really fast so very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Chigz B. Gohel

customer_reviews.title: Fast phone
customer_reviews.text: What I love about the phone is that it’s very fast. I love the picture quality and the fact that I can use the phone as a form of personal computer
customer_reviews.author: Ronny Mank

customer_reviews.title: Great photos, good size
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this device. I purchased it after reading technical reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money
customer_reviews.text: Great camera, slim, light feel. Nice features . Great phone
customer_reviews.author: Emma Jones Porter

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: All perfect. thank you. Came in perfect condition. Has worked a dream. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Discerning

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic phone, switched from an iPhone 7 and would never look.
customer_reviews.author: Manko007

customer_reviews.title: pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone January 2020. very pleased with it. original, and was delivered very soon. would recommend this seller
customer_reviews.author: mohamed hosni

customer_reviews.title: Great phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone! I love it and the camera is beyond amazing. Really is value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Cornish

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Really good, find the camera effect hard to use but maybe I haven't played with it enough to fully test it out Great battery life
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as my old phone
customer_reviews.text: Phone no where near as good as my 18month old huawei p20 pro. Phone returned.
customer_reviews.author: Ant

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: Fingerprint doesn't really work but not really a problem. Well worth it for the price
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Changing over from always using Apple for years felt like change and I love it
customer_reviews.author: HELEN

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and secure with face recognition
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for my wife and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product!
customer_reviews.text: Samsung s10 arrived in new condition and arrived three days earlier than the estimated arrival date. Brilliant work.
customer_reviews.author: Mattbilbo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phones
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is alright, but this is the best phone on the market right now.
customer_reviews.author: Keenan Agindra

customer_reviews.title: Trusted seller
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what the description said, practically brand new. What a bargain. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Francisco C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: In the description it clearly states UK version the one I received was not as it came with a two pin charger, someone had the foresight to put a three pin one in the package though. The ultrasonic finger print sensor is crap how Samsung released this I don't know. Battery is not too bad I played solid you tube for 7 hours on highest settings. I upgraded from an S7 not really much of an upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Wood

customer_reviews.title: Great Phone.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent 'phone, with great features. Lovely photo's/video quality, and lots of options to choose from, with emoji's, slo-mo, super slo-mo, live focus etc. The only problem I have with it is, because I have problems with gripping, I tend to drop it a lot, and with its' super sensitive screen, I very often cut calls, without knowing I'm doing it, as I tend to hold it too close, and end up pressing the cancel button. It's better for me with hands free. All in all a very good phone.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Gelsthorpe

customer_reviews.title: S10; marginal gains... poor battery life
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is no better than the 2yr old S7 edge it replaces:( but the S10 does charge quicker. Whoever cracks the battery tech on the next generation of phones will do very well. It's time battery tech caught up. Camera is very good. Like the wide angle panaorama mode, much bigger range. Fast enough for me but im no gamer. Finger print reader not great with wet fingers / screen. Indeed i wld say it doest work. Worth the money as upgrade, not sure yet... 23/06 update. Battery life worse now after 15 months, shouldnt have to top up charge during a normal day..
customer_reviews.author: MarkBr

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone, shame about the packaging
customer_reviews.text: The phone itself is superb, it's a Samsung flagship after all. The screen is fantastic, as is the camera. But when I received the phone it looked like it had a scratch on the top of the handset. Upon further inspection it appeared to be something like a packaging strip which goes around the edge of the phone. Not sure if it is there to protect the handset or not, but I don't want to peel it off. Just makes the handset look like it has a scratch when it doesn't.
customer_reviews.author: Cdot

customer_reviews.title: light & portable with high end specs
customer_reviews.text: Love my S10, I upgraded from an S7 edge and managed to get the S10 for a great price. Battery lasts long, camera is good quality and its super light - most other phones were just too big and heavy for me. Have no complaints about the phone. If you really pushed me all I can complain about is I keep accidentally screenshotting the homepage because of where the bixby (virtual assistant) button is.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I had a Galaxy S7 which was good but fancied an S10, at the reduced Black Friday sale price I just couldn't resist, the 128Gb of storage is excellent after the 64Gb on the S7. The battery lasts a day and a half, that's a third more than the S7 and the camera is great. I was going to wait for the 5G version to drop in price, but 4G is generally sufficient most of the time and 5G isn't yet available in my area so it was worth the punt. Impressed...
customer_reviews.author: W. J. Foster

customer_reviews.title: The fingerprint use is very special.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful phone far better than my recent phone (iphone8) There isn't much if anything to complain about.The amount of new technology is outstanding and makes the phone a pleasure to use. The fingerprint is outstanding and works in many ways and makes things so easy. I have had many phones. This gives most pleasure
customer_reviews.author: Clive Drowley I buy all my equipment from Amazon no third party involved

customer_reviews.title: Damaged packaging but phone seems fine so far
customer_reviews.text: Paid £5 extra for next day delivery, as I didn't want to risk an item for so much money getting lost in transit. It came next day as expected, however, the phone box was severely damaged (I guess that's why this was so much cheaper than anywhere else???). Thankfully, everything inside the box was absiolutely fine. The phone seems to be working well so far. Difficult getting used to Samsung switching from a Sony, but other than that, happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emilija Venckute

customer_reviews.title: Samsung S10
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time and parcel not damaged. I am not hapoy with this S10. I was assured that this phone was UK compatible, but my provider tells me that it is for the international market. It's operation is very complicated and the apps are all in different places and they cannot be moved. I think for the money the phone is not a bit intuitive. On the home page the signal, battery and other symbols are so small you can bearly see them. I will not be having another Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone!
customer_reviews.text: I have been waiting for Samsung to release a phone with an in screen fingerprint scanner and I love it :) I love the earbuds you get when you pre order aswell! They work amazingly, are so secure in your ear and the tap features make everything so easy to do :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superseded tech going up in price??
customer_reviews.text: Bought this phone for my wife, from here, in June, for £565. I was going to buy another for me but it's gone to £620, what's going on?
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product
customer_reviews.text: Extremely happy with this product. Very easy to transfer all my settings from old phone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Brand new and and excellent product - some have said it doesn't come with uk instructions but you just go on line and it's all in English. Great price and a great product - 100% happy
customer_reviews.author: Kip

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice 👌
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the White and received the black. But the phone is so good I can't complain!! If you're on the fence I would definitely recommend investing. Still one of the best on the market for a reason!
customer_reviews.author: Barndog

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant. My last Samsung was the S8 and this bad boy is so much better. The camera is as good as the Huawei P30 Pro when using the live focus option. Screen is incredible.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Sears

customer_reviews.title: Great camera.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for the camera for trip to New Zealand. Great camera. Shame about Covid!
customer_reviews.author: Lizziefish

customer_reviews.title: very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: so happy with it. Really nice screen .takes amazing photos
customer_reviews.author: samar

customer_reviews.title: good  phone
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a christmas present and she loves it , what more can i say.
customer_reviews.author: mr j a m cooper

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't feel like a pointless upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my son and he loves it!

product_meta.title: Samsung Galaxy S10 Mobile Phone; Sim Free Smartphone - Prism Black (UK version)
product_meta.description: Colour Name:Black| Style Name:S10 128 GB OnlyThe Galaxy S10 takes the classic S series a giant leap further. It features a large curved-edge screen and puts vault-like security at your fingertips with our new Ultrasonic Fingerprint Scanner. With a front camera and 3 rear cameras, including an ultra-wide and ultra-zoom lens, it’s easy to capture every angle of a scene. It also comes with a battery with so much power you’ll be able to share it with your friends. Please note, wireless charge compatible (QI standard) devices only. Battery charge above 30% required to PowerShare on the move without being plugged into mains charge.
feature_bullets: Smartphone innovation with an infinity-o display: discover an endlessly beautiful, curved-edge screen; with no home button, no notch for the receiver and a simple dot opening for the front camera, the Galaxy S10 gives you an uninterrupted viewing experience
PowerShare: it gives you the superpower to share your power wherever you are, simply connect your Galaxy Watch with the S10 and charge them at the same time, or bring your friend's back to life
True Vision Camera: with a front camera, 3 rear cameras and the ultra-wide and ultra-zoom lens, the Galaxy S10 lets you shoot every scene just as your eyes see it

Sim-free smartphone with ultrasonic fingerprint scanner: the newest way to keep your Android phone and information secure, it reads every ridge and notch of your finger, and even performs in low temperatures and strong sunlight
Clear interface to make everything effortless: screens are uncluttered, icons pop with colour, the SmartThings app is already installed and we've even made it easier to use one-handed

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
